means: 令人开心的，使人喜悦的

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含"愉快的，高兴的"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: happy, glad, cheerful, joyful, merry, delightful, gay, pleasant, nice, jolly, agreeable
means: happy ： 侧重感到满足、幸福或高兴。
glad ： 最普通用词，语气较弱，表示礼貌的惯用语。指乐于做某事或因某事而感到满足，常表愉快的心情。
cheerful ： 多指因内心的愉快而表现出兴高采烈，是强调而自然的感情流露。
joyful ： 语气较强，强调心情或感情上的欣喜。
merry ： 指精神情绪的暂时高涨，表示欢乐、愉快的心境或情景，侧重充满欢笑声和乐趣。
delightful ： 指能带来强烈的快乐，激起愉快的情感，用于非常愉快的场合。
gay ： 侧重无忧无虑、精神昂扬、充满生命的快乐。
pleasant ： 侧重给人以"赏心悦目"或"愉快的，宜人的"感受。
nice ： 语气较温和，泛指任何愉快或满意的感觉。
jolly ： 通俗用词，多指充满快乐与喜悦的神情。
agreeable ： 指与感受者的愿望、情趣或受好等和谐一致而带来的心情上的快意。

sentence.Network_en: A wedding is a joyful celebration of love.
sentence.Network_cn: 婚礼就是快乐的爱情庆典。

sentence.Network_en: She was joyful of her good result of the scientific experiments.
sentence.Network_cn: 她为自己的科学实验取得好成果而高兴.

sentence.Network_en: The meeting with the old comrades - in - arms is a joyful one.
sentence.Network_cn: 与老 战友 的那次聚会是一次欢乐的聚会.

entry.tran: 令人愉快的；使人高兴的
entry.def: Something that is joyful causes happiness and pleasure.

example.ex: Giving birth to a child is both painful and joyful...
example.tran: 生小孩是件既痛苦又令人高兴的事。

example.ex: A wedding is a joyful celebration of love.
example.tran: 婚礼就是快乐的爱情庆典。

entry.def: Someone who is joyful is extremely happy.

example.ex: We're a very joyful people; we're very musical people and we love music.
example.tran: 我们是非常快乐的民族；我们能歌善舞，热爱音乐。

means.word_mean: 3. full of or suggesting exultant happiness;

auth_sentence.content: It will be an informal, joyful learning process.
auth_sentence.res_content: It will be an informal, joyful learning process.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It will be an informal, joyful learning process.

auth_sentence.content: I wish Patrick and Lisa a joyful time together.
auth_sentence.res_content: I wish Patrick and Lisa a joyful time together.

auth_sentence.content: Just enjoy the company of your joyful fellow comrades!
auth_sentence.res_content: Just enjoy the company of your joyful fellow comrades!

stems_affixes.value_cn: 快乐的, 兴高彩烈的, 可喜的, 令人欢欣的
stems_affixes.word_buile: joy欢乐,高兴+ful……的→adj.快乐的, 兴高彩烈的, 可喜的, 令人欢欣的
joy欢乐,高兴→n.欢乐,喜悦;乐事,乐趣

stems_affixes.value_cn: 享受……的乐趣, 欣赏, 喜爱
stems_affixes.word_buile: en使……+joy欢乐,高兴→v.享受……的乐趣, 欣赏, 喜爱 v.满意

sentences.en: I lost no time in sending the joyful news to my parents at home.
sentences.cn: 我立刻把喜讯传给了家里的父母。

sentences.en: The Spring Festival is a joyful occasion.
She was joyful of her good result of the scientific experiments.
sentences.cn: 她为自己的科学实验取得好成果而高兴。
